record.field.name: sequential
record.file.name: environment

brief.brief: If selected (set to true), delays assigning the next sequential record number until the user saves the record.
When this option is true, Service Manager assigns the number after the open or log operation is committed.
If cleared (set to false), Service Manager assigns the number when displaying the initial open screen.
An unknown condition (blank field) evaluates to false.

detail.detail: If Service Manager assigns the record number after the operator saves the record (true), it never appears on the record during the open or log operation. Service Manager sends the operator a message includes the number after the save.

If Service Manager assigns the record number on first opening (false), gaps may appear in the number sequence since multiple users access the (Incident Management, Problem Management, etc.) module simultaneously and some of them may cancel their record open operation.
